'''SHUUMATSU GAIDEN''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to complete ''[[Gendou Ringo's Strange Fortune Slips]]''.

==Trivia==
===Etymology===
*The word {{lang|"gaiden"|ja=がいでん}} means "side story," making the full meaning of this Achievement name "Shuumatsu Side Story."
